Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SAE Feature Explorer

A static website for exploring SAE features extracted from GPT-2''s analysis
of Mexican restaurant Yelp reviews.

Features:
- Landing page with project stats and technical details
- Paginated feature list \(24,581 features, 939 with analysis data\)
- Feature detail pages with:
  - Interpretation text
  - Statistics \(activation rate, mean, max, std dev\)
  - Top activations with context
  - Top tokens table
  - N-gram analysis \(2/3/4-grams\)
  - Position distribution
  - Coactivated features

Built with Astro, Tailwind CSS, deployed to Vercel.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
